participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

PSH_01.LongName: Have you ever had vaginal intercourse? (Vaginal intercourse is when a man inserts his penis into a woman's vagina.)

PSH_02.LongName: How old were you the first time you had vaginal intercourse?

PSH_03.LongName: With how many partners have you ever had vaginal intercourse, even if only once?

PSH_04A.LongName: With how many different partners have you had vaginal intercourse in the past 12 months?

PSH_04B.LongName: How many times have you had vaginal intercourse in the past 12 months?

PSH_05.LongName: On how many of these occasions did {YOU/YOUR PARTNER} use a condom?

PSH_06B.LongName: The next question asks about your level of sexual attraction to BOTH males and females. Please consider the response choices carefully, as it is important that you understand them and are as honest as you can be in your answer. To whom have you felt sexually attracted, even if you did not take any action based on feeling attracted?

Levels.1: Only to females, never to males
Levels.2: Mostly to females, and at least once to a male
Levels.3: About equally often to females and to males
Levels.4: Most to males, and at least once to a female
Levels.5: Only to males, never to females
Levels.6: I have never felt sexually attracted to anyone at all

PSH_06C.LongName: The next question asks about your level of sexual attraction to BOTH males and females. Please consider the response choices carefully, as it is important that you understand them and are as honest as you can be in your answer. To whom have you felt sexually attracted, even if you did not take any action based on feeling attracted?

Levels.1: Only to males, never to females
Levels.2: Mostly to males, and at least once to a female
Levels.3: About equally often to females and males
Levels.4: Mostly to females, and at least once to a male
Levels.5: Only to females, never to males
Levels.6: I have never felt sexually attracted to anyone at all

PSH_07B.LongName: The next question asks about any sexual contact or experience. This is a wide term and can include just kissing and cuddling, Not necessarily leading to genital contact or intercourse. Have you ever had any kind of sexual experience or sexual contact with a male?

PSH_07C.LongName: The next question asks about any sexual contact or experience. This is a wide term and can include just kissing and cuddling, Not necessarily leading to gential contact or intercourse. Have you ever had any kind of sexual experience or sexual contact with a female?

PSH_08B.LongName: Have you ever had sex with a man involving genital area/penis contact?

PSH_08C.LongName: Have you ever had sex with a woman involving genital area/ vaginal contact?
